description: A legendary group of adventurers, consisting of the human hero http://anidb.net/character/132899 [Himmel], dwarven warrior http://anidb.net/character/132897 [Eisen], human priest http://anidb.net/character/132898 [Heiter], and elven mage http://anidb.net/character/130947 [Frieren], who defeated the Demon King after a ten-year-long journey.
name: Hero Party
